metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: Dataset of ground truth measurements synchronizing with airborne PLMR mission in the Yingke oasis and Huazhaizi desert steppe on July 7, 2012
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域中游盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠机载PLMR地面同步观测数据集（2012年7月7日）
metadata.description:
On July 7, 2012, airborne ground synchronous observation was carried out in plmr quadrats of Yingke oasis and huazhaizi desert. Plmr (polarimetric L-band multibeam radiometer) is a dual polarized (H / V) L-band microwave radiometer, with a center frequency of 1.413 GHz, a bandwidth of 24 MHz, a resolution of 1 km (relative altitude of 3 km), six beam simultaneous observations, an incidence angle of ± 7 °, ± 21.5 °, ± 38.5 °, and a sensitivity of < 1K. The flight mainly covers the middle reaches of the artificial oasis eco hydrological experimental area. The local synchronous data set can provide the basic ground data set for the development and verification of passive microwave remote sensing soil moisture inversion algorithm.            
Quadrat and sampling strategy:            
The observation area is located in the transition zone between the southern edge of Zhangye Oasis and anyangtan desert, on the west side of Zhangye Daman highway, and across the trunk canal of Longqu in the north and the south, which is divided into two parts. In the southwest, there is a 1 km × 1 km desert quadrat. Because the desert is relatively homogeneous, here 1 The soil moisture of 5 points (1 point and center point around each side, and several more points can be measured during walking along the road in the actual measurement process) is collected in KM quadrat. The four corner points are 600 m apart from each other except the diagonal direction. The southwest corner point is huazhaizi desert station, which is convenient to compare with the data of meteorological station. On the northeast side, a large sample with an area of 1.6km × 1.6km was selected to carry out synchronous observation on the underlying surface of oasis. The selection of quadrat is mainly based on the consideration of the representativeness of surface coverage, avoiding residential buildings and greenhouses as much as possible, crossing oasis farmland and some deserts in the south, accessibility, and observation (road consumption) time, so as to obtain the comparison of brightness and temperature with plmr observation.            
Considering the resolution of plmr observation, 11 splines (east-west distribution) were collected at the interval of 160 m in the east-west direction. Each line has 21 points (north-south direction) at the interval of 80 M. four hydraprobe data acquisition systems (HDAS, reference 2) were used for simultaneous measurement.            Measurement content:            
About 230 points on the quadrat were obtained, each point was observed twice, that is to say, two times were observed at each sampling point, one time was inside the film (marked as a in the data record) and one time was outside the film (marked as B in the data record). As the HDAS system uses pogo portable soil sensor, the soil temperature, soil moisture (volume moisture content), loss tangent, soil conductivity, real part and virtual part of soil complex dielectric are observed. Vegetation parameter observation was carried out in some representative soil water sampling points, and the measurement of plant height and biomass (vegetation water content) was completed.            
Data:            
This data set includes two parts: soil moisture observation and vegetation observation. The former saves the data format as a vector file, the spatial location is the location of each sampling point (WGS84 + UTM 47N), and the measurement information of soil moisture is recorded in the attribute file; the vegetation sampling information is recorded in the excel table.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2012年7月7日在盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠PLMR样方进行了机载飞行地面同步观测。PLMR（Polarimetric L-band Multibeam Radiometer）是双极化（H/V）的L波段微波辐射计，中心频率1.413 GHz，带宽24 MHz，分辨率1 km （相对航高3 km），有6个beam同时观测，入射角为±7º，±21.5º，±38.5º，灵敏度<1K。飞行主要覆盖中游人工绿洲生态水文试验区。本地面同步数据集可为发展和验证被动微波遥感反演土壤水分算法提供基本地面数据集。
样方及采样策略：
观测区位于张掖绿洲南缘-安阳滩荒漠过渡带，张（张掖）-大（大满）公路西侧，南北跨龙渠干渠，分为两部分，西南方向为1 km×1 km的荒漠样方，由于荒漠较为均质，在此1 km样方内采集5个点（四周各1点及中心点，实际测量过程中，可在沿路行走过程中多测几个点）的土壤水分，四个角点除对角线方向外，互相间隔600 m，西南角角点为花寨子荒漠站，便于与气象站数据比较。在东北侧，选择了面积1.6 km×1.6 km的大样方针对绿洲下垫面开展同步观测。样方的选择依据主要是考虑地表覆盖代表性、尽量避开民居和大棚、穿越绿洲农田以及南边的部分荒漠、可达性、观测（路途消耗）时间，以期获得与PLMR观测的亮度温度的比较。
考虑到PLMR观测的分辨率，同步观测中，东西方向以160 m为间隔，采集了11条样线（东西分布），每条线80 m间隔共21个点（南北方向），使用4台Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System （HDAS，参考文献2）同时测量。
测量内容： 
获取了样方上约230个点，每个点2次观测，即对覆膜玉米地，在每个采样点进行2次观测，1次膜内（数据记录中标记为a），1次膜外（数据记录中标记为b）。由于HDAS系统采用POGO便携式土壤传感器，观测获得土壤温度、土壤水分（体积含水量）、损耗正切、土壤电导率、土壤复介电实部及虚部。植被参数观测选择在一些具有代表性的土壤水分采样点开展，完成了株高和生物量（植被含水量）的测量。
数据：
本数据集包括土壤水分观测和植被观测两部分，前者保存数据格式为矢量文件，空间位置即为各采样点位置（WGS84+UTM 47N），土壤水分等测量信息记录在属性文件中；植被采样信息记录在EXCEL表格中。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在层次嵌套的尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层级嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个EC塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了LiDAR、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are the data from the multiscale dataset freely available at repositories like figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre?

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the more effective data collection method for soil moisture in an oasis-desert system the use of Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System, manual point sampling, or remote sensing technologies?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，土壤湿度的更有效数据收集方法是使用Hydraprobe数据采集系统、手动点采样还是遥感技术？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which poses a greater challenge in the field of eco-hydrological observation: the availability of multiscale observations, the calibration of sensors, or the processing of large datasets?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在生态水文观测领域，哪一项挑战更大：多尺度观测的可用性、传感器的校准，还是大数据集的处理？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the primary observation areas located for data collection in the eco-hydrological studies of the 黑河流域中游盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 黑河流域中游盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠的生态水文研究中，主要的观测区域位于哪里？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to observe soil moisture and vegetation dynamics in an oasis-desert ecosystem?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于观察绿洲-沙漠生态系统中土壤湿度和植被动态的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method used involved synchronical ground measurements using the Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System to measure soil moisture, soil temperature, and other soil properties, along with vegetation parameter observations including plant height and biomass at representative soil moisture sampling points.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及使用Hydraprobe数据采集系统进行同步地面测量，以测量土壤湿度、土壤温度和其他土壤特性，同时在代表性土壤湿度采样点观察植被参数，包括植物高度和生物量。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in heterogeneous surfaces?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集异质表面的多尺度生态水文数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge faced is the poor availability of multiscale observations, which hinders progress in understanding eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个面临的挑战是多尺度观测的稀缺，这阻碍了对异质表面生态水文过程的理解进展。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that includes multiscale observations for studying eco-hydrological processes in a desert oasis area?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含多尺度观测的数据集，用于研究沙漠绿洲地区的生态水文过程？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset is the multiscale dataset obtained from the HiWATER experiment, which includes data from eddy covariance towers, meteorological stations, L-band microwave radiometer, and ground measurements of vegetation dynamics, all quality controlled through sensor calibration and data processing.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个数据集的例子是从HiWATER实验获得的多尺度数据集，其中包括来自涡度协方差塔、气象站、L波段微波辐射计和植被动态的地面测量数据，所有数据都经过传感器校准和数据处理的质量控制。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features of the PLMR instrument used in remote sensing for eco-hydrological studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: PLMR仪器在生态水文研究中使用的具体特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: dual-polarization (H/V), L-band microwave radiometer, central frequency of 1.413 GHz, bandwidth of 24 MHz, resolution of 1 km at a flight altitude of 3 km, six beams with incidence angles of ±7º, ±21.5º, ±38.5º, sensitivity of less than 1K
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 双极化（H/V），L波段微波辐射计，中心频率为1.413 GHz，带宽为24 MHz，分辨率为1公里，飞行高度为3公里，六个波束，入射角为±7º、±21.5º、±38.5º，灵敏度小于1K。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: Which characteristics of ground sampling strategies are crucial for synchronizing with airborne remote sensing in eco-hydrological research?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，与航空遥感同步的地面采样策略的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: surface cover representativeness, avoid residential areas, ensure accessibility, minimize observational time, 160 m east-west intervals, 80 m north-south intervals
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 地表覆盖代表性，避免住宅区，确保可达性，最小化观测时间，东西间隔160米，南北间隔80米。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many sampling points were used to collect soil moisture data in the oasis and desert areas?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲和沙漠地区收集土壤湿度数据时使用了多少个采样点？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different beam angles are utilized by the PLMR instrument during observation?
Quantification.QuestionCn: PLMR仪器在观测过程中使用了多少种不同的波束角度？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the resolution of the PLMR instrument when observing from an altitude of 3 km?
Quantification.QuestionCn: PLMR仪器在3公里高度观察时的分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'ground synchronous observation' in the context of remote sensing experiments?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感实验的背景下，“地面同步观测”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Ground synchronous observation refers to the simultaneous collection of data from ground-based measurements and airborne or satellite remote sensing instruments. This method aims to provide a basis for validating and developing algorithms for remote sensing data interpretation, such as soil moisture retrieval in the context of the PLMR observations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 地面同步观测是指同时收集来自地面测量和空中或卫星遥感仪器的数据。这种方法旨在为验证和开发遥感数据解释算法提供基础，例如在PLMR观测背景下的土壤湿度提取。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways might the spatial arrangement of sampling points affect the accuracy and representativeness of soil moisture data collected in eco-hydrological studies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 采样点的空间排列方式可能会如何影响生态水文研究中收集的土壤湿度数据的准确性和代表性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The spatial arrangement of sampling points, such as the 600 m interval between corner points and denser sampling in certain areas, can significantly influence the representativeness of the data. Properly distributed sampling points allow for a comprehensive capture of soil moisture variability, while an inadequate layout may lead to biased or incomplete representation of the area's hydrological characteristics.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 采样点的空间布置，例如角点之间的600米间隔以及某些区域的密集采样，可能会显著影响数据的代表性。合理分布的采样点能够全面捕捉土壤湿度的变化，而不充分的布局可能导致该区域水文特征的偏倚或不完整表示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors have led to the development of multiscale observation techniques in eco-hydrological research?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致生态水文研究中多尺度观测技术发展的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The development of multiscale observation techniques in eco-hydrological research is driven by the need to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces. The poor availability of multiscale observations has hindered progress in the field, prompting initiatives like HiWATER to implement instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain comprehensive data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 生态水文研究中多尺度观测技术的发展是为了应对在异质表面上进行生态水文过程上尺度化的挑战。多尺度观测的稀缺性阻碍了该领域的进展，这促使像HiWATER这样的倡议实施分层嵌套尺度的仪器，以获取全面的数据。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of employing a hierarchically nested scale approach in data collection for eco-hydrological processes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在生态水文过程的数据收集中采用层次嵌套尺度方法的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing a hierarchically nested scale approach allows for capturing multi-scale and multidisciplinary data, which is crucial for understanding eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces. This approach can address the challenge of poor availability of multiscale observations by providing comprehensive data from various instruments like eddy covariance towers, LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, and L-band microwave radiometers.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用分层嵌套尺度的方法可以捕捉多尺度和多学科的数据，这对于理解异质表面的生态水文过程至关重要。这种方法可以通过提供来自各种仪器（如涡度协方差塔、激光雷达、成像光谱仪和L波段微波辐射计）的综合数据来解决多尺度观测稀缺的问题。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes can arise from focusing data collection efforts on both oasis and desert systems in an eco-hydrological study?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，专注于绿洲和沙漠系统的数据收集工作可能会产生哪些结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Focusing data collection on both oasis and desert systems allows for a comprehensive understanding of oasis-desert interactions and eco-hydrological processes. This approach can reveal how different landscapes, such as sandy deserts, desert pavement, and wetlands, interact with oasis environments, which is critical for developing accurate models and algorithms for soil moisture and other eco-hydrological parameters.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 集中数据收集于绿洲和沙漠系统，可以全面理解绿洲-沙漠相互作用和生态水文过程。这种方法可以揭示不同景观（如沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装和湿地）与绿洲环境之间的相互作用，这对于开发准确的土壤湿度和其他生态水文参数的模型和算法至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of establishing a sensor network with hierarchical scales in the context of oasis-desert interactions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠相互作用的背景下，建立分层规模传感器网络的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of establishing a sensor network with hierarchical scales is to investigate eco-hydrological processes across different landscapes, such as oasis-desert interactions. This network allows researchers to capture data at multiple scales, enabling a detailed analysis of how different surfaces interact and affect hydrological cycles, which is essential for understanding and managing water resources in such complex environments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 建立一个具有层次规模的传感器网络的目标是研究不同景观中的生态水文过程，例如绿洲-沙漠相互作用。该网络使研究人员能够在多个尺度上捕获数据，从而详细分析不同表面如何相互作用并影响水文循环，这对于理解和管理复杂环境中的水资源至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are implemented to ensure the accuracy of soil moisture data collected using the Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System in the eco-hydrological experiments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保使用Hydraprobe数据采集系统收集的土壤湿度数据的准确性，实施了哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The Hydraprobe Data Acquisition System uses POGO portable soil sensors to measure soil temperature, soil moisture, loss tangent, soil conductivity, and soil permittivity. The sampling strategy involves collecting data from approximately 230 points with each point having two observations to reduce errors. This includes both inside and outside the film in mulched maize plots, labeled as 'a' and 'b' respectively, to ensure comprehensive data collection. This approach is designed to provide accurate soil moisture data necessary for validating remote sensing soil moisture retrieval algorithms.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: Hydraprobe数据采集系统使用POGO便携式土壤传感器测量土壤温度、土壤湿度、损耗正切、土壤电导率和土壤介电常数。采样策略涉及从大约230个点收集数据，每个点有两个观测值以减少误差。这包括在覆盖玉米地膜内外的测量，分别标记为'a'和'b'，以确保全面的数据收集。这种方法旨在提供准确的土壤湿度数据，以验证遥感土壤湿度反演算法。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are ground measurements synchronized with airborne observations to facilitate the comparison with PLMR data in the oasis-desert eco-hydrological experiments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态水文实验中，如何将地面测量与空中观测同步，以便与PLMR数据进行比较？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Ground measurements are synchronized with airborne observations by dividing the area into grid samples and systematically collecting data. In the described experiments, a grid pattern with 11 east-west lines spaced 160 meters apart and 21 sampling points at 80-meter intervals was used. This extensive sampling provides a dense data set that corresponds to the spatial resolution of the PLMR observations, allowing for effective comparison and validation of brightness temperature data obtained from the airborne L-band microwave radiometer.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 地面测量通过将区域划分为网格样本并系统地收集数据来与空中观测同步。在所描述的实验中，使用了一个网格模式，包含11条东西向的线，间隔160米，以及21个以80米间隔设置的采样点。这种广泛的采样提供了一个密集的数据集，与PLMR观测的空间分辨率相对应，从而有效地比较和验证从空中L波段微波辐射计获得的亮温数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the technological components that enable the collection of multiscale eco-hydrological data in the HiWATER experiment?
Enablement.QuestionCn: HiWATER实验中用于收集多尺度生态水文数据的技术组件有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment utilizes a variety of technological components to collect multiscale eco-hydrological data, including a flux observation matrix consisting of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations. It also uses an eco-hydrological sensor network for soil moisture and leaf area index, hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing through LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer, along with synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验利用多种技术组件收集多尺度生态水文数据，包括一个由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵。它还使用生态水文传感器网络监测土壤湿度和叶面积指数，通过激光雷达、高分辨率成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计进行超高分辨率的航空遥感，同时同步进行植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods in the HiWATER experiment address the challenge of poor availability of multiscale observations?
Enablement.QuestionCn: HiWATER实验中的数据收集方法如何应对多尺度观测稀缺的挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment addresses the challenge of poor availability of multiscale observations by implementing several intensive observation periods and continuous hydrometeorological observations. Instruments are arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes, including the use of a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction, the construction of a superstation within the oasis, and the installation of multiple EC towers and automatic meteorological stations in different landscapes surrounding the oasis.
Enablement.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验通过实施多个密集观测期和持续的水文气象观测，解决了多尺度观测可用性差的问题。仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置，以捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，包括利用稀疏网络研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用，在绿洲内建设超级观测站，以及在绿洲周围不同景观中安装多个涡度协方差塔和自动气象站。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might obtaining multiscale observations in eco-hydrological experiments be challenging, and how can a dataset address these challenges?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在生态水文实验中获取多尺度观测可能具有挑战性，数据集如何解决这些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Progress in upscaling eco-hydrological processes is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. A multiscale dataset obtained from HiWATER addresses these challenges by utilizing a flux observation matrix, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing, thereby providing comprehensive data across nested scales.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 生态水文过程的上升进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的阻碍。HiWATER获得的多尺度数据集通过利用通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络和超高分辨率航空遥感，解决了这些挑战，从而在嵌套尺度上提供了全面的数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected outcomes of implementing hierarchically nested scales in data collection for an oasis-desert system?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统的数据收集中实施层次嵌套尺度的预期结果是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The expected outcomes include capturing multiscale eco-hydrological processes and investigating oasis-desert interactions effectively. By arranging instruments in hierarchically nested scales, comprehensive data can be collected to improve understanding and modeling of these complex processes.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 预期结果包括有效捕捉多尺度生态水文过程和研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用。通过以层次嵌套的尺度安排仪器，可以收集全面的数据，以改善对这些复杂过程的理解和建模。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the synchronization of airborne and ground-based observations be critical in developing eco-hydrological datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 空中和地面观测的同步在开发生态水文数据集中的重要性是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Synchronization of airborne and ground-based observations ensures that data from different sources, such as L-band microwave radiometers and ground sensors, can be compared and validated, thus enhancing the accuracy and reliability of eco-hydrological datasets and supporting the development of soil moisture retrieval algorithms.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 空中和地面观测的同步确保来自不同来源的数据（如L波段微波辐射计和地面传感器）可以进行比较和验证，从而提高生态水文数据集的准确性和可靠性，并支持土壤湿度反演算法的开发。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using a multiscale observation system to capture eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous landscapes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用多尺度观测系统捕捉异质景观中的生态水文过程的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of a multiscale observation system is highly effective in capturing eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous landscapes, as it incorporates various instruments like eddy covariance towers and L-band microwave radiometers to gather comprehensive data across multiple scales. This approach allows for detailed observation and analysis, which is essential for addressing challenges related to limited multiscale data availability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测系统在捕捉异质景观中的生态水文过程方面非常有效，因为它结合了涡度协方差塔和L波段微波辐射计等多种仪器，以在多个尺度上收集全面的数据。这种方法允许进行详细的观察和分析，这对于解决多尺度数据可用性有限的问题至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in ensuring data quality and reliability when conducting intensive airborne remote sensing missions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在进行密集的航空遥感任务时，确保数据质量和可靠性可能面临的潜在挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential challenges include maintaining the calibration and accuracy of instruments such as LiDAR and imaging spectrometers, as well as processing large volumes of data collected. Ensuring synchrony between ground measurements and airborne data is crucial for data reliability, which requires meticulous planning and execution of data collection and processing strategies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 潜在的挑战包括维护仪器如LiDAR和成像光谱仪的校准和准确性，以及处理收集的大量数据。确保地面测量与空中数据之间的同步对于数据的可靠性至关重要，这需要对数据收集和处理策略进行细致的规划和执行。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways can soil moisture datasets be expanded or refined to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological models?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 可以通过哪些方式扩展或优化土壤湿度数据集，以提高生态水文模型的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Soil moisture datasets can be expanded and refined by increasing the density of sampling points and incorporating more diverse landscape features. Implementing advanced sensors and adopting a hierarchical sampling strategy can also enhance the dataset's spatial and temporal resolution, thus improving the accuracy of eco-hydrological models in representing soil moisture dynamics.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度数据集可以通过增加采样点的密度和融入更多样的地貌特征来扩展和细化。实施先进的传感器和采用分层采样策略也可以提高数据集的空间和时间分辨率，从而改善生态水文模型在表征土壤湿度动态方面的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how eco-hydrological processes can be effectively captured across different scales in a heterogeneous surface.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在异质表面上有效捕捉生态水文过程的不同尺度。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment addresses this challenge by using instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, such as eddy covariance towers and automated meteorological stations, to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data. This includes a sparse network to investigate oasis-desert interactions and using various remote sensing technologies.
Assertion.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验通过在分层嵌套的尺度上使用仪器来应对这一挑战，例如涡度协方差塔和自动气象站，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据。这包括一个稀疏网络，用于研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用，并使用各种遥感技术。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the collected data is quality controlled and processed for eco-hydrological research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解收集的数据是如何进行质量控制和处理的，以用于生态水文学研究。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data collected during the HiWATER experiment are quality controlled through careful sensor calibration, data collection, and processing. The datasets, which include various remote sensing and ground measurements, are then carefully processed and made available through platforms like figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在HiWATER实验中收集的数据通过仔细的传感器校准、数据收集和处理进行质量控制。这些数据集包括各种遥感和地面测量，然后经过仔细处理，通过figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心等平台提供。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify the main challenges associated with collecting multiscale observations in eco-hydrological studies, and suggest potential improvements.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别在生态水文研究中收集多尺度观测的主要挑战，并提出潜在的改进建议。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The main challenge is the poor availability of multiscale observations. Improvements can include expanding the spatial and temporal resolution of the observation network, enhancing sensor technology, and integrating various data collection methods to ensure comprehensive coverage of eco-hydrological processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 主要挑战是多尺度观测的可用性差。改进措施可以包括扩大观测网络的空间和时间分辨率、提升传感器技术，以及整合各种数据收集方法，以确保对生态水文过程的全面覆盖。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential strategies for expanding datasets related to soil moisture and vegetation dynamics in heterogeneous landscapes.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在异质景观中扩展与土壤湿度和植被动态相关的数据集的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential strategies for expanding datasets include increasing the density and distribution of soil moisture and vegetation sampling points, employing advanced remote sensing technologies like hyperspectral imaging and L-band radiometry, and enhancing data quality through rigorous calibration and validation processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 扩展数据集的潜在策略包括增加土壤湿度和植被采样点的密度和分布，采用先进的遥感技术，如高光谱成像和L波段辐射计，以及通过严格的校准和验证过程提高数据质量。
